subject: RE: [junit] Paramter/Data test files?
msgSnippet: ... The Excel spreadsheets that have the data for our data driven tests reside in the same directory as the Java test cases. ... I don t think there s a right
messageBody:
> So my question was how and where do people generally put
> there data files.

The Excel spreadsheets that have the data for our data driven tests
reside in the same directory as the Java test cases.

> Anyone got an example of a JUnit testcase which uses files?
> Just would like to see it done elsewhere, as think not
> totally done correct where I work.....

I don't think there's a right way or wrong way. Not to get too
philosophical, but if the test case prevents (or finds) bugs, then it's
working. My advice: Don't overthink it.


Todd.
